actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill providing for the conveyance of certain amphibious landing craft to the Coos County Sheriff's Office, Coos County, Oregon.
subjects: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies
subjects_top_term: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

summary.text: Requires the District Director of the United States Customs Service, Portland, Oregon, to convey certain amphibious resupply cargo craft to the Coos County sheriff's office, Coos County, Oregon.

titles.title: A bill providing for the conveyance of certain amphibious landing craft to the Coos County Sheriff's Office, Coos County, Oregon.
